animeDescription: There's a new teacher in town—Spelunker! This unusual man is anything but a typical instructor, giving speeches about traffic safety to the students, reacting strangely to a humidifier, and enjoying lunch— albeit with ample condiment mishaps. With such a bizarre new role model to learn from, Spelunker's students will never be the same!  (Source: Anime-Planet)
animeStaff: [['Ashina Minoru', ['Director', 'Sound Director', 'Episode Director', 'Script']], ['Ueda Kana', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takehara Minoru', ['Animation Director']]]
